description.value:
Starting at 3rd level, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Armorer Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don't count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Artificer LevelArmorer Spells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.oKkCetAk9lUICCUg]{Absorb Elements}, @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.tD2ojMbiGW5S8iam]{Thunderous Smite}
5th@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.SlGwxNrAN8PknztW]{Enhance Ability}, @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.wj6AbH9KtGhSigMy]{Lesser Restoration}
9th@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.Cd7vr1vK21hdNNR8]{Blinding Smite}, @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.Ph1qFaV8cGDh0KRY]{Haste}
13th@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.bYFfYKrx0SOSCBYw]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.VdAxNgG0WPWAT0rw]{Stone Shape}
17th@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.E8hBZqwiPTr7gtzw]{Banishing Smite}, @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-spells.NVtNUfIvghhNzs8s]{Greater Restoration}

Note: After adding these spells to your character, set Preparation Mode to Always Prepared.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
